languages.text: "Воистину благие вести. Когда же сможем мы лицезреть его, дабы преклонить колени и вознести молитвы древним духам машины?"

traits.locale_text: "Воистину благие вести. Когда же сможем мы лицезреть его, дабы преклонить колени и вознести молитвы древним духам машины?"

languages.text: "Wondrous tidings indeed. At what time will we get to behold it so we may kneel before its splendour and offer our prayers to the ancient spirits of the machine?"
languages.original_text: "Воистину благие вести. Когда же сможем мы лицезреть его, дабы преклонить колени и вознести молитвы древним духам машины?"

traits.locale_text: "Wondrous tidings indeed. At what time will we get to behold it so we may kneel before its splendour and offer our prayers to the ancient spirits of the machine?"
"Wondrous tidings indeed. At what time will we get to behold it so we may kneel before its splendour and offer our prayers to the ancient spirits of the machine?"
"Wondrous tidings indeed. At what time will we get to behold it so we may kneel before its splendour and offer our prayers to the ancient spirits of the machine?"
"Wondrous tidings indeed. At what time will we get to behold it so we may kneel before its splendour and offer our prayers to the ancient spirits of the machine?"
"Wondrous tidings indeed. At what time will we get to behold it so we may kneel before its splendour and offer our prayers to the ancient spirits of the machine?"
"Wondrous tidings indeed. At what time will we get to behold it so we may kneel before its splendour and offer our prayers to the ancient spirits of the machine?"

languages.text: 「それはいい知らせだな。いつになったらお目にかかって、その壮麗さの前に跪いて古代の機械の魂に祈りを捧げられるんだ？」
languages.original_text: "Wondrous tidings indeed. At what time will we get to behold it so we may kneel before its splendour and offer our prayers to the ancient spirits of the machine?"

traits.locale_text: 「それはいい知らせだな。いつになったらお目にかかって、その壮麗さの前に跪いて古代の機械の魂に祈りを捧げられるんだ？」

languages.text: « C'est en effet une bien bonne nouvelle. Quand pourrons-nous l'admirer et nous agenouiller devant sa splendeur pour offrir nos prières aux esprits anciens de la machine ? »
languages.original_text: "Wondrous tidings indeed. At what time will we get to behold it so we may kneel before its splendour and offer our prayers to the ancient spirits of the machine?"

traits.locale_text: « C'est en effet une bien bonne nouvelle. Quand pourrons-nous l'admirer et nous agenouiller devant sa splendeur pour offrir nos prières aux esprits anciens de la machine ? »

languages.text: “真是个美妙的消息。不知我们什么时候才能亲眼目睹它的风采，跪在它面前，向机械中远古的机魂祈祷呢？”
languages.original_text: "Wondrous tidings indeed. At what time will we get to behold it so we may kneel before its splendour and offer our prayers to the ancient spirits of the machine?"

traits.locale_text: “真是个美妙的消息。不知我们什么时候才能亲眼目睹它的风采，跪在它面前，向机械中远古的机魂祈祷呢？”

languages.text: "Großes Glück, in der Tat. Wann werden wir ihn erblicken, damit wir vor seiner Pracht auf die Knie fallen und unsere Gebete an die alten Geister der Maschine richten können?"
languages.original_text: "Wondrous tidings indeed. At what time will we get to behold it so we may kneel before its splendour and offer our prayers to the ancient spirits of the machine?"

traits.locale_text: "Großes Glück, in der Tat. Wann werden wir ihn erblicken, damit wir vor seiner Pracht auf die Knie fallen und unsere Gebete an die alten Geister der Maschine richten können?"

languages.text: «Qué maravilla. ¿A qué hora tendremos el honor de contemplarlo para poder arrodillarnos ante su esplendor y rezar ante los antiguos espíritus de la máquina?».
languages.original_text: "Wondrous tidings indeed. At what time will we get to behold it so we may kneel before its splendour and offer our prayers to the ancient spirits of the machine?"

traits.locale_text: «Qué maravilla. ¿A qué hora tendremos el honor de contemplarlo para poder arrodillarnos ante su esplendor y rezar ante los antiguos espíritus de la máquina?».

languages.text: "Cidden harikulade bir haber. Onu ne zaman görebilir, ihtişamının önünde diz çöküp makinenin kadim ruhlarına dua edebiliriz peki?"
languages.original_text: "Wondrous tidings indeed. At what time will we get to behold it so we may kneel before its splendour and offer our prayers to the ancient spirits of the machine?"

traits.locale_text: "Harikulade bir müjde gerçekten. Onun görkemine şahit olmamıza ve göz kamaştırıcılığı karşısında diz çöküp makinenin kadim ruhlarına dua etmemize ne kadar kaldı?"
